CE 3372 Water Systems Design

Catalog Description

3372. Water Systems Design (3:3:0). Prerequisite: CE 3305, 3354. Hydraulic analysis and design of municipal water distribution, stormwater collection, and wastewater collection systems. Oral and written presentations. (Communication Intensive)

Pump and System Curves, Net Positive Suction Head

Review of pump types. Pump curves as supplied for centrifugal, mixed, and axial-flow pumps. System curves for hydraulic networks. Net positive suction head considerations. Pump power. On-Line and spreadsheet tools.

Lesson Notes   Instructor notes used in face-to-face presentation.

Pump Selection Walker, R. (1973) Pump Selection. Ann Arbor Science pp. 3-9

Pump Suction Conditions Walker, R. (1973) Pump Selection. An Arbor Science pp. 11-31

NPSH Explaination Hauser, B. A. (1991). Practical Hydraulics Handbook. Lewis Publishers, Michigan. pp. 296-299

Lift Station Design City of Houston; List Station Design Guidelines

Lift Station Design Highway Stormwater Pump Station Design. FHWA-NHI-01-007

Lesson 6 Sec 002 (morning) (F2020)

Lesson 6 Sec 001 (evening) (F2020)

Pumps and System Curves (2018), Part 1

Pumps and System Curves (2018), Part 2
